Amazing Mazes

Class Position

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Position
public class Position
extends java.lang.Object

The Position class is used to retain location information for a specified cell within a maze. A Position object represents both the mazes cell location, as well as directional information (i.e. what direction we entered this cell).

Version:
1.0 09/05/2000
Author:
Kevin Bridges ... Copyright (c) 2001

Field Summary

          Maze cell location (coordinates) represented by this Position.
private  Direction enteredDir_
          The direction from which we entered this cell position (from the perspective of the previous cell).
